name: getprimes
description: Write a getPrimes function that takes an integer value n as argument and generates prime numbers from 0 to n with asymptotic analysis. The generated prime numbers should be in an array. Your logic should be as efficient as possible (with minimal iterations). Write your own tests (10 test cases)
author: Bolaji Olajide <cooproton@gmail.com> (http://github.com/cooproton)
